title: Child care licensing records 2019-present (Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education)

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Child care licensing records 2019-present (Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Historical licensing data for all licensed child care providers (active and closed) that were open anytime from 1/1/19-present:
•	Provider name or ID
•	Provider address
•	Latest license issue date and expiration date 
•	First license issue date
•	Any additional provider data that your agency collects

If electronic records from before 1/1/19 are available, I’d be happy to collect them as well.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gabrielle Pepin

communications.subject: RE: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Child care licensing records 2019-present (Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

I wanted to follow up on the following The Missouri Sunshine Law request, copied below, and originally submitted on Aug. 7, 2023. Please let me know when I can expect to receive a response.

Thanks for your help, and let me know if further clarification is needed.

title: Child care licensing records 2019-present (Arkansas Department of Human Services)

communications.subject: Arkansas Freedom of Information Act Request: Child care licensing records 2019-present (Arkansas Department of Human Services)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Historical licensing data for all licensed child care providers (active and closed) that were open anytime from 1/1/19-present:
•	Provider name or ID
•	Provider address
•	Latest license issue date and expiration date 
•	First license issue date
•	Any additional provider data that your agency collects

If electronic records from before 1/1/19 are available, I’d be happy to collect them as well.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Gabrielle Pepin.
